summary.span: 为 类的实例提供集合容器。

span.span: Provides a collection container for instances of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现 接口，以提供用于处理 cookie 集合的一般机制。The class implements an interface to provide a general mechanism for handling collections of cookies. 例如，当应用程序设计为存储多个服务器的 cookie 时，这非常有用。For example, this is useful in the case where an application is designed to store cookies for multiple servers.

summary.span: 获取可循环访问 的枚举器。

span.span: Gets an enumerator that can iterate through a .
An for this collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只应使用 来读取集合中的数据。You should use an only to read data in the collection. 枚举器不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 枚举器没有对集合的独占访问权限。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection. 创建枚举器后，它将获取该集合的当前状态的快照。When an enumerator is created, it takes a snapshot of the current state of the collection. 如果对集合所做的更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则此快照将无法同步，并且枚举器会引发 。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, this snapshot gets out of sync and the enumerator throws an . 同时从同一集合创建的两个枚举器可以生成不同的集合快照。Two enumerators created from the same collection at the same time can produce different snapshots of the collection.
